items.preText:
Excellent from Gayle. Hasn't been able to bring out the big hits, so what can he do next to keep the runs ticking? Take quick singles, something he hasn't always been known for.

Now Mahrafe from around the stumps
items.text: defended back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: looked to belt this back over the bowler's head, beaten by the off-cutter
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: cracking punch but can't pick the gap, straight to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.preText: Golden: "A little help from Sehwag did wonder for Gayle. I heard him talking about yoga and single" -- Yoga bit correct, singles? Not so sure.
items.text: gets a good stride forward and defends to cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: punched down to mid-on as they scamper a quick single. Gayle wasn't running to the danger end though
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: he has picked the bones out of this sweep, from length on middle. Top shot. Nice wrist work to keep it all along the ground, timing top notch.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, FOUR runs

items.text: nearly chopped on, no room for the cut shot. Rolls to the leg side.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: spins away from outside off, very close to being called wide. Lewis let that go.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: drills this drive to cover point.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: stopped on him as he shaped to cut, in the end just bunted this away.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: slides back in and skids on, defended to cover. Superb over.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: beaten by a cutter that deviates late, Gayle went for the drive but feet nowhere near the pitch of the ball. Gayle walked into the stroke in the end.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: off a thick outside edge past short third man. Streaky but Gayle gets his first boundary.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, FOUR runs

items.text: gets a leading edge into the off side as he looks to defend.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: punches this away-going length ball to cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: stands tall and defends this back of length delivery towards mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: beaten by a cutter he looked to steer past the keeper.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: misfield at cover! What should've been a single is now a four. Poor. This was driven firmly, regulation stop really.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, FOUR runs

items.text: turns this to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: sharp turn from middle, defends to get a thick inside edge to the leg side.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: swept but straight to short fine.
items.postText: Golden: "Yeah, my bad. "Viru [Sehwag] mentioned two good guys to me - the yoga guy and the massage guy, who help me stay flexible. Hopefully, I will be able to touch my feet in a week's time." I saw him taking some quick singles in IPL"
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: goes back and punches back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: slides back in and keeps low, somehow he manages to defend towards point. Ball nearly sneaked through
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: wild across-the-line heave, misses. Slow off-cutter again from Mash that troubles him.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.preText: Sathyen: "Gayle is once again struggling to score runs freely, he is neither rotating the strike nor is getting the boundaries and the pressure is mounting on Lewis to keep the scoreboard ticking." -- Not sure of the rotating strike bit, he's trying on that count.
items.text: defends this slower delivery to cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run
